statements: UPDATE water_saving_tips SET tip_description = 'Take shorter showers to save water' WHERE tip_id = 1;
UPDATE water_saving_tips SET tip_author = 'Environmental Group' WHERE tip_id = 2;
UPDATE water_saving_tips SET tip_description='Reduce the time you spend in the shower to conserve water' WHERE tip_id=1
UPDATE water_saving_tips SET tip_category='Bathroom', tip_author='EcoSaver' WHERE tip_id=2
UPDATE WaterSavingTipsHomeowners SET title = 'New Title 1', description = 'Updated description 1' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE WaterSavingTipsBusinesses SET category = 'Eco Friendly', description = 'Save water for business' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE WaterSavingTipsHomeowners SET description = 'Updated description', title = 'New Title' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE WaterSavingTipsBusinesses SET description = 'New updated description', category = 'Eco-Friendly' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE WaterSavingTipsForHomeowners SET tip_title='Install Low-Flow Showerhead', tip_description='Replace your old showerhead with a low-flow one to save water.' WHERE tip_id=1;
UPDATE WaterSavingTipsForBusinesses SET business_category='Hospitality' WHERE tip_id=3;

UPDATE Users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', password_hash = 'newhashedpassword' WHERE id = 3;
